testcase.name: [ 3] given not existing opinion id - when getOpinionById() then throw OpinionNotFoundException
[ 7] given String with date in incorrect format - when isDateFormatCorrect - then return false
[ 8] given correct Opinion - when isOpinionCorrect - then return true
[ 5] given existing opinions for user - when getOpinionByReviewedUserId() - then return List<OpinionDTO>
[ 6] given String with date in correct format - when isDateFormatCorrect - then return true
[ 1] given existing opinions - when getAllOpinions() - then return List<OpinionDTO>
[ 9] given incorrect Opinion - when isOpinionCorrect - then return true
[ 2] given existing opinion id - when getOpinionById() - then return OpinionDTO
[ 4] given existing opinions of user - when getOpinionByOpinionUserId() - then return List<OpinionDTO>
